list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: have as belonging to one; own.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I do not possess a television set
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi không sở hữu một chiếc tivi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a demon or spirit, especially an evil one) have complete power over (someone) and be manifested through their speech or actions.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she was possessed by the Devil
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô bị ác quỷ chiếm hữu

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he just wanted her, to possess her
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy chỉ muốn cô ấy, sở hữu cô ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: maintain (oneself or one's mind or soul) in a state or condition of patience or quiet.
